title: Brussels sprouts stew with mushrooms
directions: Cut the bottom of the sprouts, remove the outer leaves off and halve the sprouts. Chop the onion and cut the mushrooms into quarters.

Heat the butter in a frying pan and fry the cauliflower, onion and mushrooms over medium heat 5 min. Until golden brown. Add the flour and cook, stirring, for 1 min. With. Crumble the stock cube over, add the cream and water. Bring to the boil and leave for about 10 minutes. Simmer on low heat. Stir frequently.
